text: Grand Ayatollah Sayyid Mohammad Ali Hosseini Alavi Gorgani (; March 1940 â€“ 15 March 2022) was an Iraqi-born Iranian Twelver Shi'a marja. He lived in Najaf, Iraq List of Maraji in Arabic List of Maraji in Persian (1) List of Maraji in Persian (2) He died on 15 March 2022 in Tehran. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Iraqi politicians Category:Iranian politicians
